references.formattedCitation: Cesare Agostini  and Franco Santi. La strada Flaminia Militare del 187 a. C.: tutto il percorso Bologna-Arezzo: nuove ricerche e rinvenimenti. Bologna: Grafis, 2012.

description: Faesulae (modern Fiesole) was an Etruscan foundation called Viesul, Viśl, or Vipsul. The city was conquered by Romans in 283 B.C. Sulla would settle Roman veterans there. Citizens of the town supported the conspiracy of Catiline.
